description:
Eiichiro is about to play his first match. He receives advice from the other STC members, but it only makes him more nervous. He doesn`t get a chance to calm himself down as he`s soon called to the tennis court. His first opponent is Oobayashi Ryo, a player with five years of experience, the assistant captain of the tennis team at Shonan Tech, and a top eight finalist in the prefectural tournament. It`s finally time for Eiichiro`s first match!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A First Match Full of Surprises
Un premier match plein de surprises
